title: Event Attendance Management System
description: Web application for managing event attendance
longDescription: This project is a web application built with Django and React. It allows event organizers to manage attendance, check-in attendees, and generate reports. The application is deployed on AWS EC2 instances with a load balancer and RDS database for scalability and reliability.
challenges: One of the challenges faced in this project was designing the architecture for high availability and fault tolerance. The application needed to handle high traffic and provide a seamless user experience for event organizers and attendees. To address this challenge, the application was deployed on AWS EC2 instances with a load balancer to distribute traffic and ensure uptime.
outcomes: The web application was successfully deployed and integrated into the event management workflow. It improved efficiency and accuracy by providing a centralized platform for managing attendance and generating reports. The application enhanced scalability and reliability by leveraging AWS services for high availability and fault tolerance.
